name: viirs_ntl_monthly_v10_vcmcfg_avg_masked
title: Monthly VIIRS Nighttime Lights v1 - Average Value
description: Monthly VIIRS nighttime lights product Version 1. Average value with background pixels masked. Please use in combination with VIIRS Nighttime Light Cloud Free Coverage product to confirm sufficient cloud free measurements are available within your boundary features.
details: Excludes any data impacted by stray light

extract_types_info.max: maximum value measured within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average value measured  within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum value measured  within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.sum: sum of values measured within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: C. D. Elvidge, K. E. Baugh, M. Zhizhin, and F.-C. Hsu, “Why VIIRS data are superior to DMSP for mapping nighttime lights,” Asia-Pacific Advanced Network 35, vol. 35, p. 62, 2013.
extras.sources_name: Earth Observation Group - VIIRS Nighttime Lights
